S06n624:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena arhadbhikṣusahasreṇa,
S06n624:5: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhānāṃ paripūrṇairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavinivartanīyairanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
S06n624:11: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto'ruṇodgatakālasamaye svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S06n624:12: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S06n624:13: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S06n624:19: anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06n624:21: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat |
S06n624:22: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma-kutastvaṃ śāradvatīputra kalyamevāgatya tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ ?
S06n624:23: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-sarvaprathamataraṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ,
S06n624:25: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-satyaṃ kila tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca ?
S06n624:29: upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S06n624:31: tathā hi bhagavan atṛpto'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca |
S06n624:32: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06n624:38: yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse |
S06n624:39: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca |
S06n624:40: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi |
S06n624:51: na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06n624:59: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca |
S06n624:60: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi ?
S06n624:62: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi ||
S06n624:65: yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā |
S06n624:66: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā |
S06n624:69: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ |
S06n624:71: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi |
S06n624:73: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā |
S06n624:74: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ-kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā ?
S06n624:75: sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin buddhakṣetre gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ,
S06n624:76: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,
S06n624:77: ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,
S06n624:79: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate |
S06n624:81: sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate ||
S06n624:82: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06n624:84: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sattvānupalabdhiḥ,
S06n624:88: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ ||
S06n624:89: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ,
S06n624:93: mañjuśrīrāha-tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti |
S06n624:95: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yatpramāṇo buddhaviṣayaḥ [iti] ||
S06n624:96: bhagavānāha-sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet-kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06n624:98: mañjuśrīrāha-tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā [iti] ||
S06n624:99: bhagavānāha-sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet-kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06n624:101: mañjuśrīrāha-tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam-yatpratiṣṭhito'nutpādadhātuḥ tatpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti ||
S06n624:102: bhagavānāha-yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06n624:108: bhagavānāha-yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06n624:109: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā ?
S06n624:110: mañjuśrīrāha-na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā |
S06n624:111: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati |
S06n624:113: yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā |
S06n624:114: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti,
S06n624:117: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā |
S06n624:118: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān |
S06n624:120: tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi,
S06n624:124: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā |
S06n624:125: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate |
S06n624:127: na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā |
S06n624:130: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā |
S06n624:131: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti |
S06n624:134: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān |
S06n624:135: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate,
S06n624:139: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti |
S06n624:140: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt |
S06n624:142: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati |
S06n624:144: na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā,
S06n624:146: yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā |
S06n624:148: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ ?
S06n624:150: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ ?
S06n624:152: mañjuśrīrāha-tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate ?
S06n624:158: tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
S06n624:160: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate |
S06n624:164: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte |
S06n624:169: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā-ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
S06n624:173: tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate,
S06n624:180: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati-ayaṃ kāmadhātuḥ,
S06n624:185: tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ,
S06n624:188: punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti |
S06n624:189: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī,
S06n624:191: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ,
S06n624:194: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi |
S06n624:195: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06n624:197: aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya |
S06n624:198: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06n624:199: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
S06n624:200: api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n624:201: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06n624:203: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat-pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ |
S06n624:206: mañjuśrīrāha- eṣā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim |
S06n624:214: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ |
S06n624:218: bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate |
S06n624:219: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā ||
S06n624:223: bahubuddhaśatasahasraparyupāsitāste bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpātsyante ||
S06n624:224: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati |
S06n624:226: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti,
S06n624:231: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ ?
S06n624:235: mañjuśrīrāha-kaścitpunarbhagavan sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ ?
S06n624:237: mañjuśrīrāha-bhagavan tava tāvadete buddhadharmā iti nāma na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06n624:251: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06n624:252: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante ||
S06n624:253: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06n624:259: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat-buddhā eva te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06n624:264: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat-na te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pṛthagjanadharmān śrāvakadharmān pratyekabuddhadharmān samyaksaṃbuddhadharmānadhyāmbiṣyante,
S06n624:268: tathā hi bhagavan nirālambāḥ sarvadharmā asaṃvidyamānatvāt |
S06n624:270: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma-evametacchāradvatīputra, evametat |
S06n624:274: avinivartanīyabhūmau tvaṃ śāradvatīputra pratiṣṭhitāṃstān kulaputrān kuladuhitaraśca jānīṣva,
S06n624:278: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ |
S06n624:279: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ paramaviśiṣṭaśīlaguṇapathaprāptāḥ,
S06n624:286: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n624:289: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat-kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan icchasyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum ?
S06n624:295: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06n624:300: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam ?
S06n624:303: mañjuśrīrāha-tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi,
S06n624:313: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi,
S06n624:315: mañjuśrīrāha- bodhisattva iti bhadanta śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06n624:316: bodhāya saṃprasthita iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi |
S06n624:317: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi |
S06n624:318: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi |
S06n624:320: śāradvatīputra āha-tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi ?
S06n624:323: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam ?
S06n624:329: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti |
S06n624:330: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti |
S06n624:331: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum- iyaṃ vāgiti,
S06n624:333: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi-kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti,
S06n624:334: yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
S06n624:335: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
S06n624:336: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti |
S06n624:337: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ |
S06n624:339: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06n624:346: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam ||
S06n624:347: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat-nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ |
S06n624:348: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat-nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino'pyarhanta ājñāsyanti |
S06n624:368: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra dharmadhātureva bhagavān |
S06n624:371: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ |
S06n624:379: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā |
S06n624:384: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran |
S06n624:399: na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate |
S06n624:402: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati |
S06n624:405: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
S06n624:406: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
S06n624:407: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
S06n624:408: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum |
S06n624:413: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi-asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate |
S06n624:419: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi-anuttīrṇabhaya iti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanamiti ||
S06n624:421: mañjuśrīrāha-yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ,
S06n624:424: mañjuśrīrāha-avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam |
S06n624:428: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi- avinīto bhikṣuriti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam ||
S06n624:429: śāradvatīputra āha- adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam ?
S06n624:430: mañjuśrīrāha- adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam |
S06n624:431: śāradvatīputra āha- kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi ?
S06n624:433: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06n624:438: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā |
S06n624:439: anena bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan ||
S06n624:440: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-syānmañjuśrīḥ paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo'bhavyo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum ?
S06n624:441: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
S06n624:443: tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
S06n624:451: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum ||
S06n624:452: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam ?
S06n624:455: tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt |
S06n624:466: api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā ?)
S06n624:468: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ mamāntike evaṃ bhavati-tathāgato me tathāgata iti ?
S06n624:471: na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet-tathāgato me tathāgata iti |
S06n624:473: [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā,
S06n624:475: tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ vijñapayati,
S06n624:480: tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati-tathāgato me tathāgata iti |
S06n624:481: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat |
S06n624:482: tat kataro'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati-tathāgato me tathāgata iti ?
S06n624:489: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati-utpannastathāgata iti?
S06n624:492: bhagavānāha-nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā iti ?
S06n624:493: mañjuśrīrāha-kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā buddha bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ ?
S06n624:498: mañjuśrīrāha-tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ |
S06n624:500: tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ |
S06n624:501: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā |
S06n624:503: ye'pi te anāgate'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n624:506: na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā |
S06n624:508: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati- utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti ||
S06n624:509: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat- tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam,
S06n624:510: acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ,
S06n624:511: avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya |
S06n624:517: mañjuśrīrāha-acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati vā ?
S06n624:537: tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha-ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ ime āryadharmā iti ||
S06n624:538: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat-icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam ?
S06n624:544: bhagavānāha- icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam-ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti ?
S06n624:545: mañjuśrīrāha-iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam-ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
S06n624:547: na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ |
S06n624:554: bhagavānāha-na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi-anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti ?
S06n624:559: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate |
S06n624:561: tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate |
S06n624:562: bhagavānāha-kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi-tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti ?
S06n624:565: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo'bhūt,
S06n624:567: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam ||
S06n624:568: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S06n624:569: kaḥ pratyayo'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya ?
S06n624:570: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat-ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pūrvakairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhāṣitaḥ |
S06n624:572: ayaṃ pratyayo'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya ||
